channel.title: Solarpkz (Near-Reality Source)
channel.description:
Quick Links:
Website: http://solarpkz.host22.com/
Client Download: http://goo.gl/71PhXP
Pictures: [img]http://puu.sh/6mXC7[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6mXCy[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6mXZp.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6mY2M.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6mY4u.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6mY6M.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6mY8y.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6mY9V.jpg[/img]
Solarpkz is a brand new server based on one of the most successful private server to ever exist. The server uses the exact same source of Near Reality, with even more features added from our dedicated developers. The server has only just been released, yet has many active members and we're rapidly growing, which gives us hope that this server will soon become the number one place for Runescape Private Server fans to come and play.
Features of this server include, dicing staking pking and pvming. We also have amazing new features including world bosses that spawn every hour. We hope to see you in game soon
